...when the errors end in a file name or path.  The periods add nothing (practical), but they do make it harder to cut-n-paste paths.  For example:

```
==> Already staged curl-7.46.0-64oocwwozzc7nfxpgjcqsam22islbdkf in /home/me/spack/var/spack/stage/curl-7.46.0-64oocwwozzc7nfxpgjcqsam22islbdkf.
```

title: Remove periods from ends of error comments...
